blocks.name: csetc
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include the category Set.
blocks.origin: const class csetc { SetCat }

blocks.name: diff.csetc.s
diff.csetc.c
diff.csetc.w
df-setc
blocks.content: Definition of the category Set, relativized to a subset ` u ` . Example 3.3(1) of [Adamek] p. 22. This is the category of all sets in ` u ` and functions between these sets. Generally, we will take ` u ` to be a weak universe or Grothendieck universe, because these sets have closure properties as good as the real thing. (Contributed by FL, 8-Nov-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-setc(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, setvar s6) {
  |- wceq(csetc, cmpt(s0, universe, ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cv(s0)), cop(cfv(chom, cnx), cmpo(s1, s2, cv(s0), cv(s0), co(cv(s2), cmap, cv(s1)))), cop(cfv(cco, cnx), cmpo(s3, s4, cxp(cv(s0), cv(s0)), cv(s0), cmpo(s5, s6, co(cv(s4), cmap, cfv(c2nd, cv(s3))), co(cfv(c2nd, cv(s3)), cmap, cfv(c1st, cv(s3))), ccom(cv(s5), cv(s6))))))))
  -| diffss(s5, s6)
  -| diffss(s0, s6)
  -| diffss(s3, s6)
  -| diffss(s1, s6)
  -| diffss(s2, s6)
  -| diffss(s4, s6)
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
  -| diffss(s1, s5)
  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
}

axiom df-setc(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, setvar s6) {
  ‚ä¢ SetCat =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ { <(Base ` ndx), s0 >, <(Hom ` ndx),(s1 ‚àà s0, s2 ‚àà s0 ‚Ü¶(s2[‚Ü¶]s1))>, <(comp ` ndx),(s3 ‚àà(s0 √ó s0), s4 ‚àà s0 ‚Ü¶(s5 ‚àà(s4[‚Ü¶](2nd ` s3)), s6 ‚àà((2nd ` s3)[‚Ü¶](1st ` s3))‚Ü¶(s5 ‚àò s6)))> })
  ‚ä£ d(s5, s6)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s6)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s6)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s6)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s6)
  ‚ä£ d(s4, s6)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s4, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
}

thm setcval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(chom, cnx), c2), cop(cfv(cco, cnx), c3))))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(csetc, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, co(cv(s1), cmap, cv(s0)))))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c3, cmpo(s2, s3, cxp(c1, c1), c1, cmpo(s4, s5, co(cv(s3), cmap, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2))), co(cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)), cmap, cfv(c1st, cv(s2))), ccom(cv(s4), cv(s5))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s5)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
  -| diffsw(s3, w0)
} = {
  syl5eq(c0, ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(chom, cnx), c2), cop(cfv(cco, cnx), c3)), cfv(csetc, c1), w0)
  fvmptd2(hs0, csetc, c1, ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(chom, cnx), c2), cop(cfv(cco, cnx), c3)), universe, ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cv(hs0)), cop(cfv(chom, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cv(hs0), cv(hs0), co(cv(s1), cmap, cv(s0)))), cop(cfv(cco, cnx), cmpo(s2, s3, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), cmpo(s4, s5, co(cv(s3), cmap, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2))), co(cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)), cmap, cfv(c1st, cv(s2))), ccom(cv(s4), cv(s5)))))), universe, w0)
  df-setc(hs0, s0, s1, s2, s3, s4, s5)
  tpeq123d(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cv(hs0)), cop(cfv(chom, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cv(hs0), cv(hs0), co(cv(s1), cmap, cv(s0)))), cop(cfv(cco, cnx), cmpo(s2, s3, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), cmpo(s4, s5, co(cv(s3), cmap, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2))), co(cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)), cmap, cfv(c1st, cv(s2))), ccom(cv(s4), cv(s5))))), cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(chom, cnx), c2), cop(cfv(cco, cnx), c3), wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  opeq2d(cfv(cbs, cnx), cv(hs0), c1, wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  opeq2d(cfv(chom, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cv(hs0), cv(hs0), co(cv(s1), cmap, cv(s0))), c2, wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  eqtr4d(cmpo(s0, s1, cv(hs0), cv(hs0), co(cv(s1), cmap, cv(s0))), c2, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, co(cv(s1), cmap, cv(s0))), wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  mpoeq123dv(s0, s1, cv(hs0), cv(hs0), co(cv(s1), cmap, cv(s0)), c1, c1, co(cv(s1), cmap, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  eqidd(co(cv(s1), cmap, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(c2, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, co(cv(s1), cmap, cv(s0)))))
  opeq2d(cfv(cco, cnx), cmpo(s2, s3, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), cmpo(s4, s5, co(cv(s3), cmap, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2))), co(cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)), cmap, cfv(c1st, cv(s2))), ccom(cv(s4), cv(s5)))), c3, wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  eqtr4d(cmpo(s2, s3, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), cmpo(s4, s5, co(cv(s3), cmap, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2))), co(cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)), cmap, cfv(c1st, cv(s2))), ccom(cv(s4), cv(s5)))), c3, cmpo(s2, s3, cxp(c1, c1), c1, cmpo(s4, s5, co(cv(s3), cmap, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2))), co(cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)), cmap, cfv(c1st, cv(s2))), ccom(cv(s4), cv(s5)))), wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  mpoeq123dv(s2, s3, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), cmpo(s4, s5, co(cv(s3), cmap, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2))), co(cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)), cmap, cfv(c1st, cv(s2))), ccom(cv(s4), cv(s5))), cxp(c1, c1), c1, cmpo(s4, s5, co(cv(s3), cmap, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2))), co(cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)), cmap, cfv(c1st, cv(s2))), ccom(cv(s4), cv(s5))), wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  sqxpeqd(cv(hs0), c1, wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  simpr(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  eqidd(cmpo(s4, s5, co(cv(s3), cmap, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2))), co(cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)), cmap, cfv(c1st, cv(s2))), ccom(cv(s4), cv(s5))), wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(c3, cmpo(s2, s3, cxp(c1, c1), c1, cmpo(s4, s5, co(cv(s3), cmap, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2))), co(cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)), cmap, cfv(c1st, cv(s2))), ccom(cv(s4), cv(s5))))))
  elexd(c1, c4, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(chom, cnx), c2), cop(cfv(cco, cnx), c3)), universe))
  tpex(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(chom, cnx), c2), cop(cfv(cco, cnx), c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(chom, cnx), c2), cop(cfv(cco, cnx), c3)))
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.s(s5)
  diff.hs0.s(s4)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s2, w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.wa.s(s3, w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  diff.wceq.s(s3, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s3, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s3, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm setcval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 = { <(Base ` ndx), c1 >, <(Hom ` ndx), c2 >, <(comp ` ndx), c3 > })
  ‚ä£ c0 =(SetCat ` c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 =(s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶(s1[‚Ü¶]s0)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 =(s2 ‚àà(c1 √ó c1), s3 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶(s4 ‚àà(s3[‚Ü¶](2nd ` s2)), s5 ‚àà((2nd ` s2)[‚Ü¶](1st ` s2))‚Ü¶(s4 ‚àò s5))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s4, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, w0)
} = {
  syl5eq(c0, { <(Base ` ndx), c1 >, <(Hom ` ndx), c2 >, <(comp ` ndx), c3 > }, (SetCat ` c1), w0)
  fvmptd2(hs0, csetc, c1, { <(Base ` ndx), c1 >, <(Hom ` ndx), c2 >, <(comp ` ndx), c3 > }, universe, { <(Base ` ndx), hs0 >, <(Hom ` ndx),(s0 ‚àà hs0, s1 ‚àà hs0 ‚Ü¶(s1[‚Ü¶]s0))>, <(comp ` ndx),(s2 ‚àà(hs0 √ó hs0), s3 ‚àà hs0 ‚Ü¶(s4 ‚àà(s3[‚Ü¶](2nd ` s2)), s5 ‚àà((2nd ` s2)[‚Ü¶](1st ` s2))‚Ü¶(s4 ‚àò s5)))> }, universe, w0)
  df-setc(hs0, s0, s1, s2, s3, s4, s5)
  tpeq123d(<(Base ` ndx), hs0 >, <(Hom ` ndx),(s0 ‚àà hs0, s1 ‚àà hs0 ‚Ü¶(s1[‚Ü¶]s0))>, <(comp ` ndx),(s2 ‚àà(hs0 √ó hs0), s3 ‚àà hs0 ‚Ü¶(s4 ‚àà(s3[‚Ü¶](2nd ` s2)), s5 ‚àà((2nd ` s2)[‚Ü¶](1st ` s2))‚Ü¶(s4 ‚àò s5)))>, <(Base ` ndx), c1 >, <(Hom ` ndx), c2 >, <(comp ` ndx), c3 >, (w0 ‚àß hs0 = c1))
  opeq2d((Base ` ndx), hs0, c1, (w0 ‚àß hs0 = c1))
  opeq2d((Hom ` ndx), (s0 ‚àà hs0, s1 ‚àà hs0 ‚Ü¶(s1[‚Ü¶]s0)), c2, (w0 ‚àß hs0 = c1))
  eqtr4d((s0 ‚àà hs0, s1 ‚àà hs0 ‚Ü¶(s1[‚Ü¶]s0)), c2, (s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶(s1[‚Ü¶]s0)), (w0 ‚àß hs0 = c1))
  mpoeq123dv(s0, s1, hs0, hs0, (s1[‚Ü¶]s0), c1, c1, (s1[‚Ü¶]s0), (w0 ‚àß hs0 = c1))
  eqidd((s1[‚Ü¶]s0), (w0 ‚àß hs0 = c1))
  adantr(w0, hs0 = c1, c2 =(s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶(s1[‚Ü¶]s0)))
  opeq2d((comp ` ndx), (s2 ‚àà(hs0 √ó hs0), s3 ‚àà hs0 ‚Ü¶(s4 ‚àà(s3[‚Ü¶](2nd ` s2)), s5 ‚àà((2nd ` s2)[‚Ü¶](1st ` s2))‚Ü¶(s4 ‚àò s5))), c3, (w0 ‚àß hs0 = c1))
  eqtr4d((s2 ‚àà(hs0 √ó hs0), s3 ‚àà hs0 ‚Ü¶(s4 ‚àà(s3[‚Ü¶](2nd ` s2)), s5 ‚àà((2nd ` s2)[‚Ü¶](1st ` s2))‚Ü¶(s4 ‚àò s5))), c3, (s2 ‚àà(c1 √ó c1), s3 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶(s4 ‚àà(s3[‚Ü¶](2nd ` s2)), s5 ‚àà((2nd ` s2)[‚Ü¶](1st ` s2))‚Ü¶(s4 ‚àò s5))), (w0 ‚àß hs0 = c1))
  mpoeq123dv(s2, s3, (hs0 √ó hs0), hs0, (s4 ‚àà(s3[‚Ü¶](2nd ` s2)), s5 ‚àà((2nd ` s2)[‚Ü¶](1st ` s2))‚Ü¶(s4 ‚àò s5)), (c1 √ó c1), c1, (s4 ‚àà(s3[‚Ü¶](2nd ` s2)), s5 ‚àà((2nd ` s2)[‚Ü¶](1st ` s2))‚Ü¶(s4 ‚àò s5)), (w0 ‚àß hs0 = c1))
  sqxpeqd(hs0, c1, (w0 ‚àß hs0 = c1))
  simpr(w0, hs0 = c1)
  eqidd((s4 ‚àà(s3[‚Ü¶](2nd ` s2)), s5 ‚àà((2nd ` s2)[‚Ü¶](1st ` s2))‚Ü¶(s4 ‚àò s5)), (w0 ‚àß hs0 = c1))
  adantr(w0, hs0 = c1, c3 =(s2 ‚àà(c1 √ó c1), s3 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶(s4 ‚àà(s3[‚Ü¶](2nd ` s2)), s5 ‚àà((2nd ` s2)[‚Ü¶](1st ` s2))‚Ü¶(s4 ‚àò s5))))
  elexd(c1, c4, w0)
  a1i(w0, { <(Base ` ndx), c1 >, <(Hom ` ndx), c2 >, <(comp ` ndx), c3 > } ‚àà ùïå)
  tpex(<(Base ` ndx), c1 >, <(Hom ` ndx), c2 >, <(comp ` ndx), c3 >)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c({ <(Base ` ndx), c1 >, <(Hom ` ndx), c2 >, <(comp ` ndx), c3 > })
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.s(s5)
  diff.hs0.s(s4)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, hs0 = c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, hs0 = c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s2, w0, hs0 = c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, hs0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.wa.s(s3, w0, hs0 = c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s3, hs0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s3, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s3, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s3)
}

blocks.name: setcbas
blocks.content: Set of objects of the category of sets (in a universe). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm setcbas(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(csetc, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
} = {
  eqtr4d(c0, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(cfv(chom, cnx), cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c0, co(cv(hs1), cmap, cv(hs0)))), cop(cfv(cco, cnx), cmpo(hs2, hs3, cxp(c0, c0), c0, cmpo(hs4, hs5, co(cv(hs3), cmap, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs2))), co(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs2)), cmap, cfv(c1st, cv(hs2))), ccom(cv(hs4), cv(hs5))))))), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(cfv(chom, cnx), cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c0, co(cv(hs1), cmap, cv(hs0)))), cop(cfv(cco, cnx), cmpo(hs2, hs3, cxp(c0, c0), c0, cmpo(hs4, hs5, co(cv(hs3), cmap, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs2))), co(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs2)), cmap, cfv(c1st, cv(hs2))), ccom(cv(hs4), cv(hs5)))))))), wcel(c0, c2))
  strfv(c0, c2, cbs, ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(cfv(chom, cnx), cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, c0, co(cv(hs1), cmap, cv(hs0)))), cop(cfv(cco, cnx), cmpo(hs2, hs3, cxp(c0, c0), c0, cmpo(hs4, hs5, co(cv(hs3), cmap, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs2))), co(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs2)), cmap, cfv(c1st, cv(hs2))), ccom(cv(hs4), cv(hs5)))))), cop(nat1, cdc(nat1, nat5)))

blocks.name: setccat
blocks.content: The category of sets is a category. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)

blocks.name: setcid
blocks.content: The identity arrow in the category of sets is the identity function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm setcid(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cres(cid, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(csetc, c3))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(ccid, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
} = {
  fvmptd(hs0, c0, c1, cres(cid, c1), c3, cres(cid, cv(hs0)), universe, w0)
  syl5eq(c0, cmpt(hs0, c3, cres(cid, cv(hs0))), cfv(ccid, c2), w0)
  simprd(w0, wceq(cfv(ccid, c2), cmpt(hs0, c3, cres(cid, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c2, ccat))
  syl(w0, wa(wcel(c2, ccat), wceq(cfv(ccid, c2), cmpt(hs0, c3, cres(cid, cv(hs0))))), wcel(c3, c4))
  setccatid(hs0, c3, c4, c2)
  reseq2d(cid, cv(hs0), c1, wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  simpr(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  resiexd(c1, c3, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cres(cid, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

thm setcid(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c1)=(= |` c1))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(SetCat ` c3)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(Id ` c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c3)
} = {
  fvmptd(hs0, c0, c1, (= |` c1), c3, (= |` hs0), universe, w0)
  syl5eq(c0, (hs0 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶(= |` hs0)), (Id ` c2), w0)
  simprd(w0, (Id ` c2)=(hs0 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶(= |` hs0)), c2 ‚àà Cat)
  syl(w0, (c2 ‚àà Cat ‚àß(Id ` c2)=(hs0 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶(= |` hs0))), c3 ‚àà c4)
  setccatid(hs0, c3, c4, c2)
  reseq2d(cid, hs0, c1, (w0 ‚àß hs0 = c1))
  simpr(w0, hs0 = c1)
  resiexd(c1, c3, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((= |` c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

  f1ococnv1(c0, c1, c3)
  eqtrd((c0 ‚àò c4), (= |` c3), (c0 ‚àò `' c0), (w0 ‚àß((c0 : c1 ‚Üî c3)‚àß c4 = `' c0)))
  coeq2d(c0, c4, `' c0, (w0 ‚àß((c0 : c1 ‚Üî c3)‚àß c4 = `' c0)))
  simprr(w0, (c0 : c1 ‚Üî c3), c4 = `' c0)
  ad2antrl(w0, (c0 : c1 ‚Üî c3), c4 = `' c0, (c0 ‚àò `' c0)=(= |` c3))
  f1ococnv2(c0, c1, c3)
}

blocks.name: setciso
blocks.content: An isomorphism in the category of sets is a bijection. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm setciso(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), wf1o(c0, c1, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(csetc, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ciso, c4))
} = {
  bitrd(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), wf1o(c0, c1, c3), wcel(c0, cdm(co(c1, cfv(cinv, c4), c3))))
  eleq2d(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), cdm(co(c1, cfv(cinv, c4), c3)), w0)
  isoval(c1, c2, c3, cfv(cinv, c4), cfv(cbs, c4), c4, w0)
  impbid(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(co(c1, cfv(cinv, c4), c3))), wf1o(c0, c1, c3))
  sylbid(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(co(c1, cfv(cinv, c4), c3))), wf1o(c0, c1, c3), wbr(c0, co(c1, cfv(cinv, c4), c3), cfv(co(c1, cfv(cinv, c4), c3), c0)))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cdm(co(c1, cfv(cinv, c4), c3))), wbr(c0, co(c1, cfv(cinv, c4), c3), cfv(co(c1, cfv(cinv, c4), c3), c0))), wfun(co(c1, cfv(cinv, c4), c3)))
  funfvbrb(co(c1, cfv(cinv, c4), c3), c0)
  syl6bi(w0, wbr(c0, co(c1, cfv(cinv, c4), c3), cfv(co(c1, cfv(cinv, c4), c3), c0)), wf1o(c0, c1, c3), wa(wf1o(c0, c1, c3), wceq(cfv(co(c1, cfv(cinv, c4), c3), c0), ccnv(c0))))
  setcinv(c0, c1, cfv(cinv, c4), c3, cfv(co(c1, cfv(cinv, c4), c3), c0), c4, c5, c6, w0)
  simpl(wf1o(c0, c1, c3), wceq(cfv(co(c1, cfv(cinv, c4), c3), c0), ccnv(c0)))
  mpan2i(w0, wf1o(c0, c1, c3), wcel(c0, cdm(co(c1, cfv(cinv, c4), c3))), wceq(ccnv(c0), ccnv(c0)))
  eqid(ccnv(c0))
  sylbird(w0, wa(wf1o(c0, c1, c3), wceq(ccnv(c0), ccnv(c0))), wcel(c0, cdm(co(c1, cfv(cinv, c4), c3))), wbr(c0, co(c1, cfv(cinv, c4), c3), ccnv(c0)))
  setcinv(c0, c1, cfv(cinv, c4), c3, ccnv(c0), c4, c5, c6, w0)
  syl(w0, wi(wbr(c0, co(c1, cfv(cinv, c4), c3), ccnv(c0)), wcel(c0, cdm(co(c1, cfv(cinv, c4), c3)))), wrel(co(c1, cfv(cinv, c4), c3)))
  syl(w0, wrel(co(c1, cfv(cinv, c4), c3)), wfun(co(c1, cfv(cinv, c4), c3)))
  invfun(c1, cfv(cinv, c4), c3, cfv(cbs, c4), c4, w0)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c4))
  eqid(cfv(cinv, c4))
  syl(w0, wcel(c4, ccat), wcel(c5, c6))
  setccat(c5, c6, c4)
  eleqtrd(c1, cfv(cbs, c4), c5, w0)
  eleqtrd(c3, cfv(cbs, c4), c5, w0)
  setcbas(c5, c4, c6, w0)
  funrel(co(c1, cfv(cinv, c4), c3))
  ex(wrel(co(c1, cfv(cinv, c4), c3)), wbr(c0, co(c1, cfv(cinv, c4), c3), ccnv(c0)), wcel(c0, cdm(co(c1, cfv(cinv, c4), c3))))
  releldm(co(c1, cfv(cinv, c4), c3), c0, ccnv(c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm setciso(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà(c1[c2]c3)‚Üî(c0 : c1 ‚Üî c3)))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(SetCat ` c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Iso ` c4)
} = {
  bitrd(w0, c0 ‚àà(c1[c2]c3), (c0 : c1 ‚Üî c3), c0 ‚àà dom((c1[(Inv ` c4)]c3)))
  eleq2d(c0, (c1[c2]c3), dom((c1[(Inv ` c4)]c3)), w0)
  isoval(c1, c2, c3, (Inv ` c4), (Base ` c4), c4, w0)
  impbid(w0, c0 ‚àà dom((c1[(Inv ` c4)]c3)), (c0 : c1 ‚Üî c3))
  sylbid(w0, c0 ‚àà dom((c1[(Inv ` c4)]c3)), (c0 : c1 ‚Üî c3), c0[(c1[(Inv ` c4)]c3)]((c1[(Inv ` c4)]c3)` c0))
  syl(w0, (c0 ‚àà dom((c1[(Inv ` c4)]c3))‚Üî c0[(c1[(Inv ` c4)]c3)]((c1[(Inv ` c4)]c3)` c0)), Fun((c1[(Inv ` c4)]c3)))
  funfvbrb((c1[(Inv ` c4)]c3), c0)
  syl6bi(w0, c0[(c1[(Inv ` c4)]c3)]((c1[(Inv ` c4)]c3)` c0), (c0 : c1 ‚Üî c3), ((c0 : c1 ‚Üî c3)‚àß((c1[(Inv ` c4)]c3)` c0)= `' c0))
  setcinv(c0, c1, (Inv ` c4), c3, ((c1[(Inv ` c4)]c3)` c0), c4, c5, c6, w0)
  simpl((c0 : c1 ‚Üî c3), ((c1[(Inv ` c4)]c3)` c0)= `' c0)
  mpan2i(w0, (c0 : c1 ‚Üî c3), c0 ‚àà dom((c1[(Inv ` c4)]c3)), `' c0 = `' c0)
  eqid(`' c0)
  sylbird(w0, ((c0 : c1 ‚Üî c3)‚àß `' c0 = `' c0), c0 ‚àà dom((c1[(Inv ` c4)]c3)), c0[(c1[(Inv ` c4)]c3)]`' c0)
  setcinv(c0, c1, (Inv ` c4), c3, `' c0, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  syl(w0, (c0[(c1[(Inv ` c4)]c3)]`' c0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà dom((c1[(Inv ` c4)]c3))), Rel((c1[(Inv ` c4)]c3)))
  syl(w0, Rel((c1[(Inv ` c4)]c3)), Fun((c1[(Inv ` c4)]c3)))
  invfun(c1, (Inv ` c4), c3, (Base ` c4), c4, w0)
  eqid((Base ` c4))
  eqid((Inv ` c4))
  syl(w0, c4 ‚àà Cat, c5 ‚àà c6)
  setccat(c5, c6, c4)
  eleqtrd(c1, (Base ` c4), c5, w0)
  eleqtrd(c3, (Base ` c4), c5, w0)
  setcbas(c5, c4, c6, w0)
  funrel((c1[(Inv ` c4)]c3))
  ex(Rel((c1[(Inv ` c4)]c3)), c0[(c1[(Inv ` c4)]c3)]`' c0, c0 ‚àà dom((c1[(Inv ` c4)]c3)))
  releldm((c1[(Inv ` c4)]c3), c0, `' c0)
}

blocks.name: resssetc
blocks.content: The restriction of the category of sets to a subset is the category of sets in the subset. Thus, the ` SetCat `` U ` categories for different ` U ` are full subcategories of each other. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2017.)

thm funcsetcres2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(co(c0, cfunc, c1), co(c0, cfunc, c2)))

  -| wceq(c1, cfv(csetc, c4))

} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, co(c0, cfunc, c1), co(c0, cfunc, c2), w0)
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfunc, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfunc, c2)))

  eqsstr3d(co(c0, cfunc, c1), co(c0, cfunc, c2), co(c0, cfunc, co(c2, cresc, cres(cfv(chomf, c2), cxp(c4, c4)))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfunc, c1))))
  funcpropd(c0, co(c2, cresc, cres(cfv(chomf, c2), cxp(c4, c4))), c0, c1, ccat, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfunc, c1))))
  eqidd(cfv(chomf, c0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfunc, c1))))
  eqidd(cfv(ccomf, c0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfunc, c1))))
  eqtr3d(cfv(chomf, co(c2, cresc, cres(cfv(chomf, c2), cxp(c4, c4)))), cfv(chomf, c1), cfv(chomf, co(c2, cress, c4)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfunc, c1))))
  simpld(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfunc, c1))), wceq(cfv(chomf, co(c2, cress, c4)), cfv(chomf, co(c2, cresc, cres(cfv(chomf, c2), cxp(c4, c4))))), wceq(cfv(ccomf, co(c2, cress, c4)), cfv(ccomf, co(c2, cresc, cres(cfv(chomf, c2), cxp(c4, c4))))))
  simpld(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfunc, c1))), wceq(cfv(chomf, co(c2, cress, c4)), cfv(chomf, c1)), wceq(cfv(ccomf, co(c2, cress, c4)), cfv(ccomf, c1)))
  eqtr3d(cfv(ccomf, co(c2, cresc, cres(cfv(chomf, c2), cxp(c4, c4)))), cfv(ccomf, c1), cfv(ccomf, co(c2, cress, c4)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfunc, c1))))
  simprd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfunc, c1))), wceq(cfv(ccomf, co(c2, cress, c4)), cfv(ccomf, co(c2, cresc, cres(cfv(chomf, c2), cxp(c4, c4))))), wceq(cfv(chomf, co(c2, cress, c4)), cfv(chomf, co(c2, cresc, cres(cfv(chomf, c2), cxp(c4, c4))))))
  fullresc(co(c2, cress, c4), co(c2, cresc, cres(cfv(chomf, c2), cxp(c4, c4))), cfv(cbs, c2), c2, cfv(chomf, c2), c4, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfunc, c1))))
  eqid(co(c2, cress, c4))
  simprd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfunc, c1))), wceq(cfv(ccomf, co(c2, cress, c4)), cfv(ccomf, c1)), wceq(cfv(chomf, co(c2, cress, c4)), cfv(chomf, c1)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfunc, c1)), wa(wceq(cfv(chomf, co(c2, cress, c4)), cfv(chomf, c1)), wceq(cfv(ccomf, co(c2, cress, c4)), cfv(ccomf, c1))))
  resssetc(c2, c4, c1, c3, c5, w0)
  simpld(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfunc, c1))), wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(c1, ccat))
  subccat(co(c2, cresc, cres(cfv(chomf, c2), cxp(c4, c4))), c2, cres(cfv(chomf, c2), cxp(c4, c4)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfunc, c1))))
